entry.title: Things Turn Out Okay: The Story Continues
entry.summary:
Author: Grimmalie

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,435Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 36

Summary: Clark utterly adores his family - Little Dickie is growing more and more by the day, and six-month old Jason is still his perfect baby boy. Bruce is slowly returning to Batman duties, and Clark is happy. Another unplanned pregnancy certainly shakes things up a bit. -- This is a continuation of a work by an Anonymous author. The first two chapters belong to them and the rest will be me finishing it up.

entry.title: Gods Don't Belong in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,914Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 423

Summary: “Well?” he asked, his voice low.A pause.His eyes dragged over Clark, not with drunken lust but with something sharper.“You here to watch… or join? Might as well make it a threesome.”Clark choked on his own spit so hard he nearly doubled over, coughing. It's been 5 years since both Superman and Batman began their separate crusades. Both curious but cautious.Clark remains in Metropolis, respecting the Dark Knight's strict rule to keep metas out of Gotham. Meanwhile, Bruce is consumed with finding a balance between Batman and Bruce Wayne, determine to not repeat mistakes of the past. But it's hard to do that when he is too stubborn to accept help. Fortunately, for him Clark is just as stubborn.Their paths cross when Clark is sent to cover a gala in Gotham, stepping into the city he's barred from. What begins as a professional obligation turns into an unforgettable collision with Gotham's once reclusive billionaire. Or Clark and Bruce fall for each other slowly yet quickly.

entry.title: Secret Ingredient
entry.summary:
Author: Lord_Kakarot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,616Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 11

Summary: Behind closed doors—and occasionally, wide-open windows—the Trinity has been getting a lot closer than you'd expect. Clark Kent may be Earth's greatest hero, but behind that cape is a dominant partner with an indecent streak. Bruce Wayne, Gotham’s brooding knight, is more pliant in private than you'd think. And Diana? Well… let’s just say Olympus never trained her for this kind of bonding.   With sensual tension, intimate teamwork, a lot of suggestive silence from Bruce, with more stuff than a Gotham tabloid, here's the untold tale of the world’s greatest threesome—and one traumatized witness who just wanted to deliver a smoothie.

entry.title: who married professor kent?
entry.summary:
Author: thegonekid

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,762Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 357

Summary: Clark KentProfessor in the ENGLISH DEPARTMENTMETROPOLITAN GOTHAM ACADEMY LIT 229Rating: 2/5 "Professor Kent WILL hijack entire lectures to gush about his husband. Doesn’t matter if we’re supposed to be analyzing Shakespeare—suddenly we’re all trapped listening to how ‘incredible’ his husband looked making pancakes. Apparently, love is real and I’m just failing this class because I couldn’t remember what book his husband bought him for their anniversary. Also, he laughs at his own puns. Loudly. All the time. The man is unstoppable. Someone PLEASE tell me who married this menace because I need to know who willingly signed up for this life."Lois Lane, being the investigative journalist she aspires to be, has to unravel the mystery behind her professor's secret husband.

entry.title: Alone
entry.summary:
Author: crankyy_newt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,159Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 59

Summary: “Where are the kids?" He finally asks.“Damian found out Jason had rescued a dog off the street, he wanted to stay to make sure Jason is taking care of it which led to the others finding out and also needing to go meet it. They’re all over there now,” Bruce answers, turning his chair back around to continue his report.“And Alfred?”“Since the kids aren’t here I sent him off to have a little vacation at a hotel, I figured he could use it.”Clark is quiet and Bruce knows exactly what the other is thinking about. “So we’re alone?” He asks, voice taking on a teasing lilt.Or, Clark and Bruce finally have some alone time together.

entry.title: Notes and Observations
entry.summary:
Author: mediaraiz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,293Chapters: 1/13Kudos: 36

Summary: We work. Superman listens when he should, and when he doesn’t, it’s because lives are in the balance. I don’t have to like his methods. I don’t have to like him. But if the League stands, it’s because he chooses to believe in it first. It works. For now.Or: Bruce Wayne’s journals trace thirteen years of rebuilding — through loss and recovery, through family and failure, and through the one constant presence Bruce records but never names for what it is: Clark Kent.

entry.summary:
Author: theendisgreen

Things only get more complicated when he’s saddled with a chaotic new roommate and catches the attention of Bruce Wayne—an infuriatingly arrogant playboy who seems determined to make his life harder at every turn. Between deadlines, rivalries, and unexpected sparks, Clark begins to realize that no one, not even himself, can outrun the truth, especially when it comes to the heart.♤Everything in this story is fabricated.
